title: Comment from Leonard F Levine Leonard F Levine

analysis.key_quote: I find the measure as described to place far too many political appointees into the various (2nd, 3rd, 4th or more) levels of departments and agencies.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, citing concerns about increased political appointees in civil service positions, which indicates a fear of politicization and undermining of the merit-based system.
